instruction_1: Enter your email, a unique 6-digit code will be sent to you for validation
tst_no_associated_email: There is no account associated with the entered email
tst_send_OTP: A new OTP has been sent to your email
tst_error_OTP: There was an error resending the OTP. Please try again later.
tst_enter_OTP: Enter the OTP sent to your email
tst_expired_OTP: The OTP has expired or is invalid
tst_invalid_password_requeriments: The password must be at least 8 characters long and include at least one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, one number, and one special character.
